Wszystko co można napisać o tej grze zostało juz chyba napisane. Filar sceny e-sportowej, emocje, miliony oglądających jak i grających nie może sie mylić. Gra która zmienia postrzeganie rywalizacji, wpajanie zasad fair play i same ochy i achy... gdyby nie różowy AK-47  ku#wa jego mać..... .  :P
Great classic FPS.  I would recommend this to anybody who like a strategic FPS with some good gun play.  The economy system adds another layer to the strategy.  Overall a very simple yet fun gam.
FPS muito bom, trabalho em equipa, estrategia!
Шикарная игра,но требует еще доработок и продумок!
This is a nice game for duels and for you reflex;)

I play Counterstrike since i am 13 yrs old

O Counter Strike Global Offensive é um jogo bastante divertido para jogar online com amigos!
O único problema deste jogo é não ter um bom Anti-Cheat, no modo competitivo o que não falta são Hackers!
De resto recomendo bastante este jogo para se divertirem a jogar com os vossos amigos, ou até mesmo sozinho!
Тикрейт отличный. Сервера топ. 10 горящих жоп/10 смурфов, читеров, уебков неадекватных
The Game that dominates you! Great!

If you want a somewhat more strategic experience rather than the normal run-and-gun of most shooters, this one is for you. It still has a great playerbase, and many custom modes are also available on player-run servers.
